title: Emmys viewers can't stop laughing at Gwyneth Paltrow's awkward shuffle across the stage
text:
When Gwyneth Paltrow chose her red carpet look for the Emmys this year, she overlooked one crucial factor - whether she could actually walk in her tight-fitting gown.

The Hollywood star was given the prestigious job of announcing the Oustanding Lead Actress in a Drama Series winner, but the moment was somewhat overshadowed by her awkward shuffle across the stage as she struggled to move her legs in her dress.

Read more: See what the stars wore to the Emmys 2019

Paltrow was wearing a vintage 1963 Valentino gown with a sheer black neckline and floor-sweeping sleeves, but it appeared to be the snug column skirt that was causing her problems by restricting her stride.

Gwyneth Paltrow appears onstage at the 71st Primetime Emmy Awards on Sunday, Sept. 22, 2019, at the Microsoft Theater in Los Angeles. (Photo by Phil McCarten/Invision for the Television Academy/AP Images) More

Emmys viewers were quick to pick up on her laboured progress across the stage, mocking her on Twitter.

Gwyneth Paltrow’s cautious little shuffle across the stage to present is the least Gwyneth Paltrow thing I’ve ever seen Gwyneth Paltrow do. #Emmys #goooooooooop — Melissa Lippert (@MelLippert) September 23, 2019

I want to be Gwyneth Paltrow trying to walk across the #Emmys stage for Halloween. — Elaine L. (@LaineyGossip) September 23, 2019

Story continues
description: Even Hollywood stars struggle with a tight dress and high heels combo sometimes.
